metadata.commander_name: Terry de la Mesa Allen Sr.

narrative.title: 1St Infantry Division - 1943Q2
narrative.situation: American Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q2.
narrative.objectives: Standard infantry division: assault, hold terrain, sustained combat operations. Tunisia Campaign: break Axis defensive lines in mountainous terrain.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Mixed North African terrain: coastal plains, rocky hills (Djebels), wadis, limited desert sectors

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Night operations (18th RCT at Longstop Hill)
Combined arms coordination with attached armor

environment.terrain_type: Mixed North African terrain: coastal plains, rocky hills (Djebels), wadis, limited desert sectors
